title: WATCH:  Wisconsin police officer rescues cows from burning barn
description: Sturgeon Bay police officer Andrew Crabb was nearing the end of his overnight shift when he spotted smoke coming from the nearby barn, authorities say.

title: Hard-line House Freedom Caucus votes to remove Marjorie Taylor Greene: Sources
description: The House Freedom Caucus voted last month to oust Georgia Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, multiple sources confirmed to ABC News.

title: Russian jets 'harass' US drones for 2nd straight day, Pentagon says
description: The U.S. drones "harassed" by Russian jets were flying over Syria.

title: DeSantis campaign says he raised $20M since launching presidential bid weeks ago
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has raised $20 million since the launch of his presidential bid, his campaign announced on Thursday

title: Cameraman injured at Yankee Stadium by wild throw has broken eye socket
description: A cameraman hit in the head by an errant throw Wednesday night at Yankee Stadium has a broken eye socket and is home resting, the YES Network said in a statement Thursday

title: Twitter sends Meta cease-and-desist letter over new Threads app: Sources
description: Twitter sent Meta a cease-and-desist letter over the newly launched Threads.

title: WATCH:  Rare okapi calf explores the outdoors at UK zoo
description: An endangered okapi calf at the Chester Zoo ventured outside for the first time at six weeks old, running on the grass playfully under the watchful eye of its mom.

title: No criminal charges in fatal Buffalo fire that killed firefighter who was trapped
description: Authorities say a fire in a Buffalo costume shop where a trapped firefighter died earlier this year has been ruled accidental and no criminal charges will be filed

title: Andrew Tate loses appeal against house arrest as human trafficking case continues
description: Andrew Tate has lost an appeal against a court’s earlier decision to keep him under house arrest

title: TikTok and 5 content creators ask federal judge to block Montana from banning app
description: TikTok and a group of five content creators who are suing the state of Montana over its first-in-the-nation law to ban the video sharing app are now asking a federal judge to block implementation of the law while the case moves through the courts

title: Clark Atlanta president says affirmative action ban presents 'opportunity' for HBCUs
description: Dr. George French spoke to ABC News' Phil Lipof about why he believes the ruling provides an opportunity and challenge for historically Black colleges and universities.

title: WATCH:  Dogs dive into pool at day care to keep cool
description: Dogs at the Lucky Puppy day care center in Maybee, Michigan, beat the heat in the facility's swimming pool.

title: OceanGate suspends all exploration and commercial operations after Titan implosion
description: OceanGate said it is suspending all exploration and commercial operations after five people were killed during its expedition to the Titanic wreckage.

title: US job openings dip to 9.8 million but remain high, showing resilience
description: U.S. job openings slipped in May but remained at levels high enough to show the American labor market remains resilient in the face of sharply higher interest rates

title: Hackers claim responsibility for sending hoax email claiming UConn president had died
description: A shadowy hacking group has taken responsibility for sending an email Wednesday to the University of Connecticut community that claimed the school’s president had died

title: Kevin Spacey accuser denies defense claims he made up sex assault: 'it was horrific'
description: A man who says Kevin Spacey subjected him to a torrent of verbal abuse and grabbed his crotch has denied making up the allegations

title: Trump aide Walt Nauta pleads not guilty in classified documents case
description: Walt Nauta, the aide to former President Trump who was charged alongside him in the special counsel's classified documents case, has pleaded not guilty to all charges.

title: WATCH:  Giant panda celebrates her 10th birthday
description: The first giant panda born in Taiwan celebrated her 10th birthday with an ice birthday cake and hundreds of visitors as party guests.

title: WATCH:  Video shows Russian fighters 'harassing' US drones over Syria
description: The U.S. military has released video of a tense encounter over eastern Syria as Russian fighter jets were seen "harassing" three American military drones.

title: Memphis prosecutors seek death penalty for man charged in teacher kidnapping, killing
description: Prosecutors say they will seek the death penalty against a man charged with kidnapping a Memphis, Tennessee, school teacher during an early-morning run and killing her

title: Despite prevention efforts, fireworks used to target people, police in Minneapolis
description: Large groups of people used fireworks to target other people and police in Minneapolis over the Fourth of July holiday, even as police staffing doubled and the city took other measures to try and avoid such trouble

title: Trial of 10 accused over 2016 Brussels attacks that killed 32 takes major step
description: The trial of 10 men accused over the 2016 suicide bombings at Brussels airport and a subway station is taking a major step toward its conclusion

title: 7 children, 2 adults hurt after car crashes into school in Wimbledon, UK
description: London police say seven children and two adults were injured after a car crashed into an elementary school on a very narrow road in Wimbledon in southwest London

title: More Americans apply for jobless benefits, but layoffs not rising significantly
description: The number of Americans applying for jobless benefits rose last week, but remains at healthy levels despite the Federal Reserve’s attempt to cool the labor market by raising interest rates

title: Death toll rises to 17 in South Africa gas leak blamed on illegal gold processing
description: The death toll in a toxic gas leak in South Africa blamed on an illegal gold processing operation in a settlement of closely packed shacks has risen to 17

title: Shell CEO calls it 'irresponsible' to cut oil production now
description: The head of global energy giant Shell says it would be “irresponsible” to cut oil and gas production at a time when the world economy is still dependent on fossil fuels

title: Ukraine's counteroffensive is 'advancing' but 'we want to do it faster': Zelenskyy
description: Ukraine’s counteroffensive allowed their forces to take the “initiative” against Russia but “we want to do it faster," President Volodymyr Zelenskyy told Martha Raddatz

title: 2 firefighters die while battling blaze aboard ship in New Jersey
description: Two firefighters died while battling a blaze aboard a cargo ship docked in Newark, New Jersey, on Wednesday night, officials said.

title: China says 239 people died from COVID-19 in June in a significant uptick
description: China says 239 people died from COVID-19 in June in a significant uptick months after it lifted most containment measures

title: WATCH:  Scaffolding gives offshore workers amazing view of whale shark
description: These workers at an offshore platform near Australia were blown away by the amazing view from their scaffolding as a whale shark swam past.

title: WATCH:  Sphere lights up Las Vegas skyline with massive LED display
description: Sphere, a new Las Vegas venue, lit up for a trial run of its LED light display on the Fourth of July, ahead of its official opening in September.

title: Man with guns arrested near Obama home 'attempted to evade' Secret Service: DOJ
description: Jan. 6 defendant Taylor Taranto had been set for a detention hearing Wednesday.

title: Dramatic video released of Russian fighter jets 'harassing' US drones over Syria
description: The U.S. military released dramatic video of Russian fighter jets "harassing" three American military drones in eastern Syria, officials said

title: LA sheriff investigating after video shows deputy throwing Black woman to the ground
description: The Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department is investigating a June 24 incident in Lancaster, California, where a sheriff’s deputy slammed a Black woman to the ground.

title: Meta officially launches Twitter rival Threads: What to know
description: Meta, the parent company of Facebook, officially launched Threads on Wednesday.

title: Criminal charges called for against deputies, officer in alleged assault
description: All officers involved in the incident have been fired or terminated.

title: 'Insanity’: 4th of July mass shootings leave 20 dead, 126 injured
description: Amid celebrations and fireworks over the long Fourth of July holiday weekend, cities across the country were left reeling from the scourge of gun violence in America.
